snippet: The asset management arm of the firm will combine the lenders Flagship Credit Acceptance and CarFinance Capital into one company that will enable them to complete larger securitizations at a lower cost.
abstract: The asset management arm of the firm will combine the lenders Flagship Credit Acceptance and CarFinance Capital into one company that will enable them to complete larger securitizations at a lower cost.

headline.main: Perella Weinberg Said to Merge 2 Subprime Auto Lenders
